bloglist.title: Introduction to React

bloglist.detail: React is a javascript code for the browser, which provide a simply way to manage the data and the view in website interface

bloglist.title: Introduction to linux
bloglist.content: Linux is a popular open-source operating system...
detail: linux is a middleware btw device hardware and programmer software, it gave a simply way for programmer create their own software without the need to understand the hardware
i will say that OS is like a our thought, it is the software that run in our brain, and tell our body what to do
But there's existing different OS, like windows, mac, and linux, they are different in their own way, but they all have the same purpose, to manage the hardware and software resource
The difference between them is the way they manage the hardware and software resource, and the way they manage the data
For example, windows and mac OS are highly bundled system, it's hard to customize your system, but linux is more flexible, you can customize your system as you want
As a result, Linux could be a lightweight system. If you download a linux OS, it only take a few GB space, but windows OS could take up to 100GB space
therefore, most of the embedded system only support linux OS to reduce the system resource, and be a efficient system

bloglist.title: Introduction to embedded system
bloglist.content: Embedded system is a computer system that is designed to perform a specific task...
detail: Embedded system is a computer with explictly defined hardware and software, some embedded system is without operating system but only firmware
Some embedded system designed with time constraint, so they have to be responsive, and efficient, that's why some embedded system is only using firmware
Here's a technical term for embedded system, it is called 'real-time system', it is a system that must respond to events within a specific time frame

bloglist.title: Introduction to computer network
bloglist.content: Computer network is a collection of computers and other devices connected to each other...
bloglist.detail: Computer network technology consist of hardware and software, the hardware is the network device like router, switch, and modem, the software is the network protocol like TCP/IP, HTTP, and FTP

bloglist.content: To be a better programmer, you need to have a strong foundation in programming languages...

bloglist.title: Introduction to software development
bloglist.content: Software development is the process of creating software...
bloglist.detail: Software just a bundle of code. The code could be divided into different things. 1. from programming language, which serve for specific application.

bloglist.title: introduction to programming language
bloglist.content: Programming language is a language that can be understood by computer...
bloglist.detail: To create a programming language, you need to create a compiler, and semantic analysis

bloglist.title: Introduction to compiler
bloglist.content: Compiler is a program that translate the code from one language to another...
bloglist.detail: Compiler is a program that translate the code from one language to another, it consist of lexical analysis, syntax analysis, semantic analysis, and code generation

bloglist.title: Introduction to toolchain
bloglist.content: Toolchain is a set of tools that help the programmer to create software...
bloglist.detail: Toolchain is a set of tools that help the programmer to create software, it consist of compiler, linker, and debugger

bloglist.title: Introduction to Container
bloglist.content: Container is a software that manage the hardware and software resource...
bloglist.detail: Container is a software that manage the hardware and software resource, it consist of kernel, shell, and application
